title: MyChelle Firming Serum, Serious Hyaluronic, 1-Ounce Bottle
description: An unsurpassed botanical firming serum with proven hyaluronic acid, marine oligopeptides, L-proline, resveratrol, copper peptides, and superoxide dismutase to support the connective tissue and visibly firm your skin.   Hydroxypropyl beta-cyclodextrin (from starch) adds to the firming effect by smoothing the skin and providing a protective moisture barrier without clogging skin pores.

title: Physicians Formula Dark Spot Corrector & Skin Brightener 1.0 FL OZ
description: Physicians Formula Dark Spot Corrector & Skin Brightener 1.0 FL OZ. The experts of Physicians Formula created this dark spot cream to prevent and correct the signs of skin aging: fine lines, wrinkles, dark spots and the loss of firmness and moisture. Every product is clinically tested to deliver visible results without a prescription. This exclusive formula with serum repairs uneven skin tones and helps the evidence of sun damage: dark spots, dark patches and skin stresses. Works to keep skin looking brighter and uniform in tone.

title: Body Lotion Almond Organic 8 Ounces
description: Few things are more beautiful than peace of mind, body, and spirit. Inspired by the nature around us and the lifestyles of those who embrace it, Desert Essence was founded in 1978 to bring the best of nature’s offerings to personal care regimens everywhere. Inspired by the desert and all that it has to offer, we became the first company to market Jojoba Oil. Since then, we have expanded to include natural and organic beauty care products specifically formulated to improve the lifestyles of today’s most health-conscious consumers. As we discover more natural ingredients, our products will continue to evolve, but our core values remain constant, staying true to you, to our inspiration, the desert, and to the Earth that nourishes us.
